meta.name: Hand Symmetry 1
meta.comment: In these exercises, the right and left hands reverse roles in the rhythms.

ideas.r1: Play each exercise playing only nd only or right and left hands in unison.
ideas.r2: Play with alternating sticking and treat Rs as rests. Perform with both right-hand and left-hand lead.

exercises.display: rlrl r-lr lrl- rlr-|lrlr l-rl rlr- lrl-|rlrl <1/7>
